sentences.en: After a deep conversation, I knew he was my comrade.
sentences.cn: 经过深入的交谈我知道他就是我的同路人.

sentences.en: Bow's room was as neat , on the other hand, as his comrade's was disorderly.
sentences.cn: 鲍的卧室干净整洁, 跟他朋友那间屋子的杂乱无章正好相反.

sentences.en: But worse than his comrade's pain was the dumb anguish in her face.
sentences.cn: 但比他的伙伴的痛苦更令人难受的却是她脸上那种默默的悲伤.

sentences.en: By owner - peasants Comrade Mao Tse - tung means the middle peasants.
Comrade Wu has been trying to get you on the phone.

sentences.cn: 同志们，请支持这项动议。

sentences.en: From time to time we stumbled over the frozen corpse of a comrade.
sentences.cn: 我们不时地被一名冻僵的战友尸体所绊倒.

sentences.en: He misses his comrades from his days in the army.
sentences.cn: 他想念在部队时候的战友。

sentences.en: He rallied to the side of his wounded comrade.
sentences.cn: 他赶往救助受伤的战友.

sentences.en: His comrade replied that this was just the chicken in question.
sentences.cn: 他的同伴答称这正是那个娃儿.

sentences.en: His comrade stirred him once or twice and he became quiet.
sentences.cn: 他的同伴推了他一两次,他就安静下来了.

sentences.en: I met with an old comrade - in - arms of mine in the train.
sentences.cn: 我在火车上碰到一位老战友.

sentences.en: I said never mind, we are still good comrade.
sentences.cn: 我回答说别在意, 我们还是好同事.

sentences.en: I will avenge my comrade in arms on the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我要为战友们向敌人报仇.

sentences.en: The words of his comrade irritated him unbearably.
sentences.cn: 他的伙伴讲的话使他激怒得难以忍受.

sentences.en: This makes the leadership of comrade in arms, and very annoyed.
sentences.cn: 这使得战友和领导都很恼火.

sentences.en: This yellow belt novice is allowed to subdue his more experienced comrade.
sentences.cn: 这位黄带的新手获许制服比他更有经验的同伴.

trans.tran_cn: （尤指共患难的）朋友，战友，同志
trans.tran_en: socialists  or  communists  often call each other ‘comrade’, especially in meetings
